title: Mario Minatelli
text: Mario Minatelli (29 June 1925 – 1990) was an Italian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>.
